Sinopse: Uncle Tak, the old martial-arts master and medicine in normal life has severe problems with his former student Jonny, who wants nothing more than to kill his old master to show everyone who the real master is. Jet is not familiar with the American way of life, but all the better with the way of fighting.—Oliver Heidelbach
